name: Delftware System
description:
Your boss, a giant star creature that provides all the heat in the galaxy you live in, is dying.  He's the last of his species and there's no way to save him. This game is about building his replacement.

There's also like 10+ side quests you can do. I didn't count them but there's at least that many.

Please don't play this game if you're sensitive to strong language,  the topic of death, or flashing lights.

Definitely do not play this game if you're under 13. 

I'd rather nobody under the age of 18 play it. While, there's no lewd content that gives the game a reason to have that rating, I personally don't think you should play this if you're not an adult.
